alert.note: Alert for Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 1:42PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Wakulla and southeastern Leon Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 142 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Florida A And M, or 7 miles northwest of Woodville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Florida State University, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Ralford Greenway, Macon Community Park, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Eight Mile Pond, Killearn Estates, Chaires, Lake Ella, Tallahassee Mall, Tallahassee Regional A/P and State Capital Complex. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
